title: Start changelog
descriptions: Fix the bug with Mailchimp campaigns using the same segment, which messes up the email recipients
Start this changelog (which is why the version number is starting at 100)
Add limit on new contacts when fetching roster
Redirecting to a page the user doesn't have permission for will redirect back to the index

descriptions.description: Check Mailchimp audience contacts list so that only missing contacts are ever added (no unnecessary API calls)

descriptions: Replace the contacts in the given audience tag rather than updating each individual contact's tags (much more efficient)
